name: 重叠·前夜谭：猫与少女
description:
1. Read stories full of suspense and collect clues to the case in the story (game duration is 4-5 hours);
2. Choose different plot options and experience different story endings (a total of 7 endings);
3. Special system: As the story progresses, there will be 3 opportunities to "analyze the truth". At this time, other characters will ask Zhang Xiao (the player) several "questions" in succession. The player needs to choose a series of correct answers from the "clues" that have been obtained, and finally pull out the cocoon and find the truth-it can be archived at any time during the process. Please enjoy the challenge;
4. After completing the game for the first time, the player can unlock the "Special Code" option on the game start interface, including CG appreciation and ending appreciation; After successfully collecting all the endings, the "???" script in the "Special Code" can be unlocked.

STORY


In the world, there are many worlds.
They not only exist in parallel, they are also twisted, entangled, and leaning against each other.
This is the "Overlapping World".

Sunday, October 8, 2028

Zhang Xiao, a senior high school student, has a strange power called “Master Key”. Since he was young, he can communicate with other “worlds”. One day, Zhang Xiao’s classmate Miao Xueling had an accident. In order to find the truth, Zhang Xiao and his friends launched a secret investigation. However, Zhang Xiao seemed to be afraid of the power he possessed.

CHARACTER
